fulltext:
Technical
Lead
DAU NGOC
NHAT
CONTACTS
OBJECTIVE
Nhat has gained the SAP Hybris certificate and has around 12 years of
experience in software development including experience with
complex SAP Hybris framework projects enterprise e-commerce
platform, web technology of Java (J2EE), and web java frameworks:
Spring (Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud), Struts (1,2), Tapestry. 
He also has solid foundation in computer sciences: data structure,
algorithm and experience in working with many database systems
(SQL, NoSQL), application servers. Moreover, being strong in problem-
solving skill and experience in researching and applying new
technologies. He also can support and guide team members in
technical parts of project.
daungocnhat@gmail.com
 +84 916801567
Ho Chi Minh city, VietNam
EDUCATION
University of Natural Sciences
2001-2006
 Bachelor of Information Technology
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Languages            : Java, C#, C++ (Visual C++), JavaScript, XML,
TML, CSS, NodeJs, ReactJs.
Databases            : Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL,
MongoDB.
Tools                     : Eclipse, Atom, Microsoft Visio, iReport,
Docker, JMeter, VisualVM, Wrk, SVN, Git.
Frameworks /Libraries    : SAP Hybris, Spring (Spring MVC,
Spring Boot, Spring Cloud), Struts (1,2), Tapestry, Liferay,
Hibernate, iBatis, Velocity, Apache Solr, Axis2, Jasper Report,
Quartz, Log4J, Apache ActiveMQ, Ehcache, Vertx.
Web Servers              : Apache Http Server, Nginx, IIS.
Application Servers    : Tomcat Server, JBoss, Oracle Weblogic,
lassfish.
Operating Systems    :  Windows, Linux, Mac OS.
Cloud technologies    : AWS.
Methodologies: Waterfall, RUP, Agile (Scrum).
QUALIFICATIONS
SAP Hybris Core Certified Developer
SAP Hybris Commerce Certified
Developer
Dau Ngoc Nhat - Technical Lead
WORK EXPERIENCE
Apr 2019 – Present:        Knorex, HCMC, Vietnam 
     Technical Lead
Dec 2017 – Mar 2019      Engineer V-key HCMC, Vietnam 
     Senior Software 
Jun 2012 – Dec 2017       Sequent Asia IT (SAI Digital), HCMC, Vietnam 
     Senior Java developer, Technical Lead
Sep 2011 – May 2012     Pyramid Consulting VN, HCMC, Vietnam 
     Senior Java developer
Dec 2008 – Jun 2011       NetBlue VN, HCMC, Vietnam 
     Senior Java developer
Mar 2008 – Nov 2008      Officience, HCMC, Vietnam  
     Software developer
Oct 2006 – Feb 2008        FCGV, HCMC, Vietnam 
     Software engineer
Career Summary
Professional Experience
Project: Adserving
Technical Lead
 Knorex
Skill Set:
Java/J2EE, Stripes, Wrk Vertx,
JavaScript, AWS, AliCloud (Funcion
Compute), Glassfish, MongoDB.
 Project Description
 Knorex
       XPO as a demand-side platform (DSP) enables you to reach billions of
       devices worldwide instantly. You can choose to target your audience
       whether globally or locally, all via programmatic buying from private
       marketplace and open ad exchanges in real-time. 
  Nhat
       Leads on component “Adserving”. Receive request from any source to 
       render the ad and display for customer. Main tasks: 
  ◦     Planning, estimation for tasks in project.
  ◦     Support  team member in technical. Responsible for technical part in
project.
  ◦     Research and implement the solution for handling tracking restriction
from ITP2 using browser fingerprint.
Project Team Size: 5
 Project Description
 V-key
     builds V-OS app is embedded in mobile devices so that it can protect
     required mobile applications. And V-key based on V-OS in order to provide
     security solutions (OTP, PKI, eKYC) for organizations (banks,
     governments). 
 Nhat
     works in server components (authentication, provisioning, secured
     messaging, eKYC dashboard, …) of V-Key solutions. Main tasks: 
◦     Fix bugs and resolve client’s issues.
◦     Implement and research enhancements, new components and features
for company’s product.
◦     Deploy server components to many different environments (application
servers, databases).  And go to customer’s place (data center) for troubleshoot,
resolve production issues.
Project Team Size: 10
Project : Server Components
Senior Software Engineer
V-key
Skill Set:
Java/J2EE Spring (Spring MVC,
Spring Boot, Spring Cloud),
ReactJs, Git, Jenkins, Linux,
Mac OS, Apache Http server,
Nginx, Apache Tomcat, Jboss,
Oracle Weblogic, Docker, Oracle,
SQL server, MySQL
Dau Ngoc Nhat - Technical Lead
Sai Digital
Project: Beauty Garage

Technical Leader
 Project Description
 Build
Skill Set:
     e-commerce solution for Beauty Garage client using SAP Hybris platform
Java/J2EE, Spring, SAP Hybris,
 (www.beautygarage.jp).This e-commerce is for spa industry and integrates
Apache Solr, Git, Jenkins, Linux,
  with SAP ERP. It also has another site (Eyelash Garage) for making beauty
Apache Http server, Apache
  with glasses.
Tomcat, AWS, MySQL.
 Nhat
     Technical support, review code, assign tasks for members.
◦     Estimate, research, implement complex tasks in the project.
◦     And SAP ERP integration.
Sai Digital
Project Team Size: 20
Project: Razer
Technical Leader
 Project Description
 Build
Skill Set:
     e-commerce solution for Razer client using SAP Hybris platform. Focus in
Java/J2EE, Spring Integration,
integration between Hybris and SAP ERP. Using Data Hub technology of
Restful web services,
Hybris.
Hybris (Data hub, order process),
Git, Linux.
Sai Digital
AIL
Project Team Size: 6-10
Senior Developer
 Project Description
 Arvind
Skill Set:
     Limited (formerly Arvind Mills) is a textile manufacturer and the
Java/J2EE, Spring (MVC)
flagship company of the Arvind Group. Now Arvind want to leverage Hybris
Framework, Hybris (ASM,
platform’s capability to build an Omnichannel solution for their
CSCockpit, payment gateway,
e-commerce business.
OCC), JQuery, Git, Message queue.
 Nhat
◦     Build message queue for Data Hub.
◦     Implement some steps in ASM mode, integrate with payment gateway.
◦     Modify features in CSCockpit.
Sai Digital
Essilor
Project Team Size: 25
Senior Developer
 Project Description
 Essilor
Skill Set:
     has requested that SAI develop a Hybris B2C portal/website for their
Java/J2EE, Spring (MVC)
customer
Framework, Hybris (Search,
Provision. Provision wants to provide Australian Eye Care Professionals
Price, Tax, Checkout process,
(ECPs) with an online channel to sell their products.
Emailing, Order process), Apache
 Nhat
Solr, Velocity, JQuery, SVN.
◦     Build solr search, customize checkout process, customize cart, customize
price and tax.
◦     Implement all email features, build order management module.
◦     And generate receipts and reports.
Dau Ngoc Nhat - Technical Lead
Sai Digital
Project: Bookworld
Technical Leader
Skill Set:
Hybris (CS Cockpit, Storefront UI),
Java/J2EE Spring MVC Framework,
Jasper Report, GIT.
Project Team Size: 6-10
 Project Description
 Build
     wishes to move their current  sites (www.bookworld.com.au and
www.angusandrobertson.com.au) over into Hybris. There has been a platform
RFP performed, where Hybris was chosen as the platform of choice.
 Nhat
 ◦     Implementing new features in CS Cockpit, customizing CS Cockpit to
support many sites, customize Order tab in CS cockpit.
◦     Implement searching (product, customer, order) and voucher
functionality in CS cockpit.
◦     Implement some features on storefront and export invoice for web site.
Dau Ngoc Nhat - Technical Lead
